title: A short treatyse of certayne thinges abused in the Popysh Church longe vsed: but now abolyshed, to our consolation, and Gods word auaunced, the lyght of our saluation.
author: Moone, Peter.
notes: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad impremendum solum.
Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
